explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY s IN p.`~subqueries` SATISFIES ANY v WITHIN s.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' AND ANY u WITHIN v.`~child`.`~children` SATISFIES u.`#operator` = 'Filter' AND CONTAINS(u.`condition`, '`t`.`c12`') END END END

statements: SELECT t.c11, (SELECT l.c11, r.c22 FROM shellTest l JOIN shellTest r USE HASH(build) ON l.c11 = r.c21 AND r.type = "right" AND r.c22 = t.c12 WHERE l.type = "left") AS sub FROM shellTest t WHERE t.c11 > 0 AND t.type = "left" ORDER BY t.c11
